body: We allocate memory [aligned at 64B](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/f84fdc7866a566d2a1c31d5006b24c6d6e841846/aten/src/TH/THGeneral.cpp#L168) when a tensor is of non-trivial size. @ezyang - When you say 'aligning vec256 at 64B' do you mean [at_aligned](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/f84fdc7866a566d2a1c31d5006b24c6d6e841846/aten/src/ATen/cpu/vec256/vec256_base.h#L10), which is used to stack allocate temporary memory in [some instances](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/6f6b03566ba3c4828f6ee87a772f9d161be0bae7/aten/src/ATen/cpu/vec256/vec256_double.h#L60)?
